summary: Provides a utility for converting segmentation class identifiers among integer labels, color triples, and RGB arrays, enabling encoding of masks to integer maps and decoding back to visual color representations.
business_intent: Facilitates preprocessing and postprocessing of segmentation data by offering a consistent mapping between human‑readable colors and model‑compatible class IDs, streamlining training and inference pipelines in computer‑vision and geospatial applications.
